primaryStack.title: Primary stack for products, data, and cloud
primaryStack.subtitle: Technical capabilities focused on software engineering, data, and cloud infrastructure.
primaryStack.summary: I connect front-end, back-end, and data engineering to deliver fast, secure, and metric-driven experiences. This stack is curated to reduce friction, scale efficiently, and keep the codebase readable for teams and recruiters.

highlights.label: Products
highlights.detail: Responsive, accessible interfaces with consistent performance across the funnel.

highlights.label: Data
highlights.detail: ETL, APIs, and modeling for actionable analytics and clear dashboards.

highlights.label: Cloud
highlights.detail: Predictable deploys, observability, and data governance on Azure.

primaryStack.srDescription: Full Stack Developer and Data Engineer with experience in software engineering, data integration, automation, and cloud. Primary stack focused on JavaScript, TypeScript, Python, SQL, Power BI, Azure Cloud, ETL, and Data Warehouse, delivering as a Software Engineer for web products and data pipelines.
